video_description:
PhoneArena reviews the Sony Tablet S. Known now as the Sony Tablet S, this Honeycomb flavored tablet has a unique spin on the whole tablet design -- while throwing in some differentials such as PlayStation Certification and the tight integration with some of Sony's services. Starting off at $500 for the 16GB model, it obviously seems very reasonable, but it's going to take more to stand head above water in a sea of crowded tablets...
For more details, check out our web site: http://www.phonearena.com/reviews/Sony-Tablet-S-Review_id2830
title: Sony Tablet S Review
